wikipedia_page.main: John Welsh (1824–1859) was a Scottish meteorologist.

response: *John Welsh (Australian footballer) (born 1938), Australian rules football player for Essendon
*John Welsh (bishop) (1856–1916), Bishop of Trinidad and Tobago, 1904–1916
*John Welsh (English footballer) (born 1984), English football player for Grimsby Town
*John Welsh (meteorologist) (1824–1859), FRS, Superintendent of Kew Observatory
Directors (superintendents) of the observatory included Stephen Demainbray, Francis Ronalds, John Welsh, Balfour Stewart, Francis John Welsh Whipple, Charles Chree, and George Clarke Simpson.
